hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: Feel free to reach out with any questions or collaboration inquiries.

success.title: Message Sent!
success.description: We'll get back to you soon.

free.question: Is Sum Diary free?
free.answer: Basic features are free. Advanced AI analysis features are available in the premium plan.

license.question: Can I use HUA UX Framework commercially?
license.answer: Yes, it's provided under the MIT license, so commercial use is allowed.

support.question: How can I get technical support?
support.answer: You can reach out through GitHub Issues or email.
